thread.title: Win Autumn Essentials with the Telegraph - Terms and Conditions
thread.title_full: Win Autumn Essentials with the Telegraph - Terms and Conditions - Telegraph

author: The Telegraph
title: Win Autumn Essentials with the Telegraph - Terms and Conditions
text: Gaya Cosmetics – Terms & Conditions Win Gaya Cosmetic products worth £132 Once the winner is chosen, we will kindly ask the winner to send us a clear and bright face photo so we can match the best shades for their specific skin tone. Delivery included - Please allow time for delivery No cash alternatives Prize non-transferable The promotion will be running on our website and Facebook under the coupon code: stella35. Valid between Oct 18th-November 1st 2015. Raleigh – Terms & Conditions WIN a fantastic Raleigh Electric bike worth over £1700 Entrants must be 18 or over. UK residents only. The winner will be chosen at random and contacted via email, the bike must be delivered to the winners nearest registered Raleigh electric bike dealer and assembled in store. Dublin – Terms & Conditions Win a pair of Dublin Medway boots worth £169.99 Dublin will be in touch with the winner once receiving their details after the competition has ended to discuss size. Dublin will ensure prize delivery is made within 28 days of the receiving the winners details. No cash alternatives Prize non-transferable HoMedics – Terms & Conditions Win a HoMedics Radiance professional microdermabrasion device HoMedics will be in touch with the winner once receiving their details after the competition has ended. HoMedics will ensure prize delivery is made within 28 days of the receiving the winners details. No cash alternatives. Prize non-transferable. Pure Collection – Terms & Conditions Win a 100% Pure Cashmere Asymmetric Poncho worth £149. Winner will be contacted within 14 days of draw closing. Poncho shown is available in 3 colours. Please visit www.purecollection.com and enter product number LK-S90 to view. Winner has option to choose whichever colour they like. Stock availability cannot be guaranteed. If garment is not available, the winner has the option to wait for item to come back into stock or can order an alternative poncho up to the value of £149. Garment will be delivered by standard delivery which takes 5-7 days. Offer - 25% discount applies to full price items only and cannot be used on sale items, is non-transferable and cannot be used in conjunction with any other offers. Free delivery applies to UK standard delivery charge only. Offer expiry midnight 20th December 2015. This Works – Terms & Conditions Win sleep plus pillow spray worth RRP £35 This Competition is open to customers aged 18 and over only. To enter the competition, submit your details by 23.59 GMT 30th October 2015. Entries received after the closing date will not be processed. No cash alternative will be offered. No responsibility is taken for entries that are lost, delayed, misdirected or incomplete or cannot be delivered or entered for any technical or other reason. Proof of delivery of the entry is not proof of receipt. No purchase is required to enter the competition. The Competition is not open to employees of This Works, their family members or anyone else connected with the competition. Entry into the competition is on acceptance of these Terms and Conditions. This Works accepts no responsibility for any damage, loss, liabilities, injury or disappointment incurred or suffered by you as a result of entering the Competition or accepting the prize. The Promotion will be governed by English law. This Works reserves the right to cancel or change the competition if it is reasonable to do so or if unforeseen circumstances arise. For This Works T&C’s page visit www.thisworks.com/stella-competition telegraph.co.uk
